title: LoL Client stuck at Authenticating?
body: The title is, in itself, the issue I'm presented with. Anyone else encountering this problem? Alongside that I seem to be running into an error when attempting to access my boards profile, gives me a 404 Ezreal screen.

replies.body:
Same problem here. Authenticating...cycle...authenticating...cycle.

I tried the hextech tool, which didn't fix anything.

I've gone to the support page and just get the stupid questions about whether I tried the Hextech tool and a bunch of requests for logs which I sent.

I reinstalled the client from scratch and could log in exactly once while the client updated...then logged out of the client, and when I tried to log back in, same problem. Unable to play for three days now.

These issues you're reporting may be tied to a network problem failing to reach the authentication servers, so it can't verify your credentials and log you in.  You'll want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure that access from your network is allowed, and able to get in.  You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-config your firewall settings as a step.  Let me know if you have any questions on this.

Have the same problem, getting an error message every time I try to authenticate. Game worked fine earlier today, no new patches or downloads between now and then. 

Ran HRT, said "everything is ok"....still can't authenticate. 

Help? Whats going on?
Did you end up fixing this? I'm stuck at authenticating for 5 days now....any information would help
hey man did you find a fix?

It has to do with the internet traffic coming through. League of legends is not a priority through your internet provider, so you need to tell whoever takes care of your internet to allow league of legends to connect to the authentication servers.

* deleted the game and installed from external drive with 7.5 patch(I had to DL the 7.6 again)
* reset my router
* tried to connect with different connection(my neighboors wi-fi and from my mobile)

Lately I have been downloading bunch of SDK Manager updates but I hardly think they're related to my issue. Please help {{item:3070}}
